meanings.definition: Convert (a message or piece of text) into a coded form by using a cipher.
meanings.sent1: She enciphered the secret message to keep it safe.
meanings.sent2: The spy enciphered the confidential document before sending it.
meanings.sent3: The detective enciphered the clue to solve the mystery.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was enciphered in every letter she wrote.
meanings.sent5: The ancient map was enciphered with hidden symbols.

meanings.definition: To encode or encrypt a message using a cipher.
meanings.sent1: He enciphered the password to protect his online account.
meanings.sent2: The computer program enciphered the data for security reasons.
meanings.sent3: The magician enciphered his tricks to baffle the audience.
meanings.sent4: The artist enciphered his emotions into the painting.
meanings.sent5: The treasure map was enciphered with cryptic clues.
